title: MkDocs plugin that automatically refreshes the build pages when the page has been rebuilt

update_message.description: Message that will be displayed to the user when the page has been rebuilt (default: 'The page has been updated. Do you want to reload?')

yes_button_text.description: Text of the button that will be displayed to the user when the page has been rebuilt (default: 'Yes')

no_button_text.description: Text of the button that will be displayed to the user when the page has been rebuilt (default: 'No')

check_interval_seconds.description: Interval in seconds in which the plugin will check if the page has been rebuilt (default: 60 seconds)
